reviewText: It is nice to be able to see some of my favorite movies again from when I was growing up.
summary: I loved Hart to Hart when it was on television
Title: Hart To Hart: Harts In High Season

reviewText: Another great DVD with the Hart toHart group. Always enjoyed the tV series and this TV movie is just as great.
Title: Hart To Hart: Harts In High Season

reviewText: Hart to Hart's are great entertainment; but I have had a difficult time with each vendor taking a long time to send each movie to me of the Hart to Hart Movies and every DVD I own of these movies will not play in my 4 year old DVD Player Recorder, but will play in my 18 year old DVD player only; that is frustrating.  What if my old machine finally breaks down?  How will I watch my 7 Hart to Hart movies?  I wonder if anyone else has this problem.  That is the reason for the 4 stars.
Title: Hart To Hart: Harts In High Season

reviewText: Another good show after the season was over. The couple made a good attempt at entertaining you with this movie. I liked the plot and seeing the same characters again after all these years. It's worth buying and viewing this show.
summary: Hart to Hart : Harts in high season
Title: Hart To Hart: Harts In High Season

reviewText: I was very pleased to see the movies of this show, as I really loved the series on TV, and enjoyed the DVD's of it. The movies continued in the same way as the series with the same characters, and it was a pleasure to watch them again. Thanks for making it available
Title: Hart To Hart: Harts In High Season

reviewText: this is really a great show i lved it when it wason in teh 80s and love it more now
Title: Hart To Hart: Harts In High Season
